title: Using VTOLs
contents: Designing VTOL units is similar to designing ground units.
When choosing a propulsion, simply pick "VTOL" propulsion.
You will then be able to select from the available VTOL Weapons.
To produce your VTOL designs, you will need to construct a VTOL Factory.
In order to repair, rearm, and maintain your VTOL units, you will need to construct one or more VTOL Rearming Pads.
